head.title: Kathlyn M. Kim Weds Jody Shilan

hedline.hl1: Kathlyn M. Kim Weds Jody Shilan

block.p: LEAD: Dr. Kathlyn Meekyung Kim was married to Jody Blair Shilan yesterday at Abigail Kirsch at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y. The Rev. Jim Covington performed the nondenominational ceremony. The bride, 26 years old, is a daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Unsup Kim of Teaneck, N.J. She graduated from the University of Pennsylvania and the Mount Sinai School of Medicine and will become a resident in obstetrics and gynecology at the New York Hospital-Cornell Medical Center in July.

LEAD: Dr. Kathlyn Meekyung Kim was married to Jody Blair Shilan yesterday at Abigail Kirsch at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y. The Rev. Jim Covington performed the nondenominational ceremony. The bride, 26 years old, is a daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Unsup Kim of Teaneck, N.J. She graduated from the University of Pennsylvania and the Mount Sinai School of Medicine and will become a resident in obstetrics and gynecology at the New York Hospital-Cornell Medical Center in July.

Dr. Kathlyn Meekyung Kim was married to Jody Blair Shilan yesterday at Abigail Kirsch at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y. The Rev. Jim Covington performed the nondenominational ceremony. The bride, 26 years old, is a daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Unsup Kim of Teaneck, N.J. She graduated from the University of Pennsylvania and the Mount Sinai School of Medicine and will become a resident in obstetrics and gynecology at the New York Hospital-Cornell Medical Center in July. Her father is the director of surgery at the Elmhurst (Queens) Hospital Center. Her mother, Myungsoon Kim, teaches at the Korean School in Tenafly, N.J.

Mr. Shilan, 30, is a son of Martin Shilan and Micki Shilan, both of Teaneck. He graduated from Rutgers University and received a master's in landscape architecture from the University of Massachusetts. He is a principal in Landforms, a landscape architecture firm in Teaneck. His mother is the tennis professional at the Montammy Golf Club in Alpine, N.J. His father is a senior controller for Faberge in New York.
